Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Hey, you guys arrive at the right time.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "I'm caught up in all these rescue missions here and I'm in over my head. Would you be able to help?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "Come on. It's got to do with the Red Tide, and we can't really ask the newbies for help. I'm sure Gray Raven is a lot more experienced.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'I knew I could count on the Gray Ravens.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "So here's the deal: the Silk Worm Commandant and a Construct member have been engulfed by the rising tide. We've lost all contact with them.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'I think it might be too late to do anything now...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'One of the two remaining Constructs in their team has been assigned to a different group.', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Bridget', 3: "Things are a little more complicated with the other one. She wasn't there with them when their commandant was attacked, because she had been under treatment for severe injury.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "She regretted not being able to save their commandant, and firmly believes that he is just too injured to contact us and that he's waiting to be rescued.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "So she refused to be assigned to a different team and later escaped at night. She's also somehow blocked location tracking.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'I would have asked a technician to track her down any other day, but we really need to do it ourselves now.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'So? Would you be able to help?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Wonderful! Well, let me send her information to your terminal.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "She's probably looking for their commandant where the Red Tide has been. Look for her in the ruins.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "Yes, that's her. I'll leave the job to you.", 4: '1'}
